wathman janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha china sabandatha thawa thawath wardhanaya kara ganimata katayuthu kala ayuru prashansaniya bawa hethema awadharanaya kaleya.hambanthota waraya idikirimata chinaya labadun pradanaya pilibanda athamun yam yam de prakasha kala wagema eda amparedi di. es. senanayaka mahatha idikala senanayaka samudraya pilibanda yam yam katha gethu bawa kiweya.senanayaka samudraya nisa ampare janathawage jiwitha sapawath wi thibena ayuru penwa dun jayarathna mahatha hambanthota waraya me rate dhana ulpathak bawin dwesha sahagatha lesa karana wiwechana pilibandawa salakilimath nowiya yuthu bawa pawasiya.uthuru palathe laksha 9 kda nangenahira palathe laksha 5 k pamana demala janathawa sitina athara anekuth pradeshawalada sinhala ha muslim janathawa samanga ekwa sitina athara kisidu ayakuta monayam ho asadharanayak ayukthiyak wenna janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha katayuthu kara nathayi pawasiya.shri lankawa siyaluma ratawal samanga sahayogayen katayuthu karana athara kisidu waira sahagatha sithuwillakin yuthuwa katayuthu nokarana bawa pawasiya.siyalu dushkara kriya madagena rate wesena sama minisakutama yukthiya, sadharanaya itukirimata kriyakarana janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata erehiwanna hrudayasakshiyata anuwa wiruddha wiya haki dayi prashna kaleya.janamadhyawedin wana silarathna senarath, wasantha priya ramanayaka kula shri kariyawasam, ariyananda dombaagahawaththa, sujiwa malage yana mahathwarunge sewayada mehidi agayimata lak kerini.
